description: This is a React functional component representing a login page for the OceanLMS application. It handles authentication via different providers and displays relevant UI elements based on URL parameters.

methods.name: LoginPage()
methods.description: React functional component that provides a login interface for OceanLMS, handling login flows triggered by user interaction.

methods.name: handleLogin
methods.description: Function to initiate login via specified provider (email or google).
